tool_description:
Simple REST API by Clearout for instant, real-time and bulk email verification that can be seamlessly integrated with all programming languages. Use Clearout's Email Verification API to clean your email list and maintain list hygiene by preventing spam leads entering your forms. Reduce Bounce and Deliver more with Clearout API.
View API Docs |
name: Clearout
title: Clearout

api_list.name: findBulkEmailsProgressStatus
api_list.description: To know the overall progress status of the bulk finder request

api_list.name: findEmailStatus
api_list.description: To know the email finder request status in queue

api_list.name: getCredits
api_list.description: Instantly get to know the available credits
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clearout1.p.rapidapi.com/email_verify/getcredits"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clearout1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clearout1.p.rapidapi.com/email_verify/getcredits"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clearout1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: verifyBulkEmailsProgressStatus
api_list.description: To know the overall progress status of bulk verify request
